Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-21538 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 20.14.0-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-21538 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 20.14.0-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs is earlier than 20.14.0-3, affected by CVE-2024-21538
